meta.notes: Merged ontology (structure) + hazards.csv (content). Keywords are sourced from CSV and stored as skos-like altLabel plus a flattened keywords list. Sources are taken from CSV Source and/or dc:source in JSON-LD. Sample data is taken from CSV hasSampleData and/or hazards:hasSampleData in JSON-LD. IDs remain stable CURIEs; verbalization is generated via templates (no per-hazard handcrafted text).

hazards.description: War is sustained armed conflict between states or organized groups. Triggered/caused by: Terrorism (from causedByHazard IDs).
verbalized_en: Caused by hazard(s): Terrorism.

Keywords: unexploded ordnance (UXO); abandoned explosive ordnance; landmine/cluster munition remnants; post-conflict contamination; accidental detonation; civilian casualties; blocked reconstruction/agriculture; clearance operations; marking/fencing; risk education.

Schlüsselwörter: Blindgänger (UXO) (auch: nicht explodierte Munition); zurückgelassene Munition (AXO); Minen-/Streumunitionsreste; Kampfmittelbelastung nach Konflikt; unbeabsichtigte Detonation; zivile Opfer; blockierter Wiederaufbau/Landwirtschaft; Kampfmittelräumung; Markierung/Absperrung; Risikoaufklärung.
